Package me.talkcode.acc.core.bookkeeping.books

Interface Ledger

All Superinterfaces:
Book
public interface Ledger extends Book
A book that Contains the information that is required to prepare financial statements. The Ledger is organized in LedgerRecords. It includes AccountClasses and Accounts for assets, liabilities, owners' equity, revenues and expenses.

    Defines the type of entry that can be posted in a Ledger Account.

  • Method Details

    • getRecord

      Optional<LedgerRecord> getRecord(LedgerAddress addr)
      Gets a LedgerRecord
      Parameters:
      addr - the address to the ledger record
      Returns:
      the LedgerRecord that is stored under the provided address.

    • getRecordInfo

      Optional<LedgerRecordInfo> getRecordInfo(LedgerAddress addr)
      Gets information about the LedgerRecord.
      Parameters:
      addr - the address of the LedgerRecord.
      Returns:
      an empty Optional if the LedgerRecord is not found, otherwise the LedgerRecordInfo is returned.

    • getAccountsQueryable

      me.talkcode.commons.query.Queryable<Account> getAccountsQueryable()
      Gets a handle to query Accounts in the Ledger.
      Returns:
      a Queryable to be used to query Accounts in the Ledger.

    • getClasses

      Set<AccountClass> getClasses()
      Gets the set of AccountClassess that are part of the Ledger
      Returns:
      the set of AccountClassess added to the Ledger

    • addAccountClass

      AccountClass addAccountClass(String id, String name) throws DuplicateAccountClassException
      Adds a new AccountClass to the Ledger
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the class
      name - the name of the class
      Returns:
      the newly created instance of AccountClass
      Throws:
      DuplicateAccountClassException - when there is already an AccountClass with the same ID.
